appSubtitle: Tell me your scenario, and I'll create the perfect outfit for you
scenarioPlaceholder: e.g., Attending a company annual party, need formal but not too grand attire, want to look professional yet approachable...
aiThinking: AI is carefully selecting for you...
quickStart: Quick Start - Click an example below:
